name: Hatch, Inc
description: Operator of an educational platform intended to create classroom services that have a lasting impact on the lives of children. The company's educational platform develops thoughtful, innovative early learning services and fuelled by research that engages early learners with interactive experiences, objectively assesses skills in seven domains of development and individualizes learning, enabling teachers with data and curricular experiences to fuel the success of every child.
one_liner: Operator of an educational platform intended to create classroom services that have a lasting impact on the lives of children. The company's educational platform develops thoughtful, innovative early learning services and fuelled by research that engages early learners with interactive experiences, objectively assesses skills in seven domains of development and individualizes learning, enabling teachers with data and curricular experiences to fuel the success of every child.
